commit message: [issue #77] Fix to disable buttons when continuing a track. Removed 'start tracking' menu entries
[issue #123] Initial crude version of a debug info screen
[issue #134] [issue #30] [issue #67] Explicitly set the permission to write to the external storage, as it seems needed by SDK 1.6
[issue #115] [issue #59] Fixes to audio recording / beep notifications
[issue #115] [issue #59] Accounted for media players object possibly null if user disabled sounds

Added message 'Waiting GPS fix...' when starting/resuming a track, it's then replaced with the accuracy once the fix is ok.
That should help new users not understanding why the buttons are still greyed even if the GPS indicators is green.
[issue #97] Dramatic export speed improvement thanks to oshea.paul
[issue #143] Updated Swedish translation thanks to peter.kindstrom
[issue #144] Removed '.xml' suffix from layout list thanks to peter.kindstrom
Preparing release v0.5.4
Preparing release v0.5.5
Added ant script, moved external JARs to libs/ folder to comply with Android SDK ant script
[issue #123] Fixed possible issue when building path to custom layouts
[issue #149] [issue #103] Updated Slovak translation thanks to prescott66
[issue #148] Possible perf. improvement thanks to huebner.nils
[issue #142] Added Eclipse project files to SVN
[issue #125] Added partial Norwegian Nynorsk translation thanks to dittaeva
Converted svn:ignore to .gitignore
Added readme
Deleted unused wiki/ folder
[issue #151] Added button to delete all tracks

Merge branch 'master', remote-tracking branch '151/master'
